parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID or project and regulation is provided

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature parameter to request in different APIs

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Response message type text. Equals the error response

response_fields.name: ret_offset
response_fields.description: The offset for next page request

response_fields.name: timestamp
response_fields.description: Timestamp for storing comment info use

response_fields.name: user_id
response_fields.description: The user id of the one who posted the comment

response_fields.name: complete
response_fields.description: The complete of the one who posted

notes: The documentation appears to be for a comment list retrieval API. There are several error codes listed at the bottom of the image but they were not included in the structured data as they are standard error responses rather than parameters or response fields.
